revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WL-300 |revision=g |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/13/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=MSQWL300G |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702 |cpu1_cspeed=125 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV320DT-90EI |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV4M16DT-6K |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Micro;Mobio;2406, 214K, TW;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''SpaceLink 802.11g Access Point''' [http://web.archive.org/web/20121015021607/http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/WL300g Product page (via archive.org)] The '''ASUS''' logo and "WL-300G R1.40" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The PA IC is marked with "2406" and "214K". Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''ASUS''''s manual. *The power adapter shown in the initial FCC filing is a :'''PHIHONG''' PSC10A-050(A2) :(100~240VAC, 50/60Hz, 0.3A -> 5VDC, 2A) *The power adapter in the C2PC filing made 09/05/2003 is a :'''Delta Electronics''' ADP-10SB REV. BH :100~240VAC, 50/60Hz, 0.4A -> 5VDC, 2A {{TechInfoDepot|Asus_WL-300g}}
{{WPLink|Asus_routers}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/wrls-asus-wl-300g.shtml On '''iXBT'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?1337-WL-300g-images On '''wl500g.info'''] ==Images== File:ASUS WL-300g.jpg|ASUS WL-300g File:Asus wl300g board.jpeg|PCB R1.40 File:Wl300g-pcb.jpg|PCB R1.91 [[Has images::internal| ]]
